rows.label: qst720101_msg0001
rows.name: What's that...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0002
rows.name: What? It's like a mist...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0003
rows.name: It's an ether miasma.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0004
rows.name:
If we leave it like this, the road
to the harbor will be blocked.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0005
rows.name:
No way... it wasn't there
when I passed through...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0006
rows.name: Looks like it just formed.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0007
rows.name:
Geez. And this is the only way
to the harbor to get the ferry.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0008
rows.name:
There are monsters, too. You
think the miasma attracted them?

rows.label: qst720101_msg0009
rows.name:
Yeah. If we don't act fast, their
numbers will just keep growing.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0010
rows.name:
Oh? I can burn it away with my
power. Something like that will
be blown away in a single shot.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm sure it would. Along with the
whole ecosystem around here.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0012
rows.name:
What's the problem? The monsters
are in the way, too. It's killing
two birds with one stone.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0013
rows.name:
Hikari, your power is
certainly magnificent.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0014
rows.name:
But if we use it the wrong way,
we'll become just like Metsu.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0015
rows.name: Sorry to interrupt, but...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0016
rows.name:
I think Kasumi can get rid of that
ether miasma with her power.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0017
rows.name: She can do that?!

rows.label: qst720101_msg0018
rows.name:
Yes, but I'll need to concentrate.
If you could take care of the
monsters around here...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0019
rows.name:
Understood. Hikari, this is
a chance to use your power.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0020
rows.name:
Fine, fine. I think this is the
long way around, but if that's
what my Driver wants, I'll do it.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0021
rows.name: Okay fine. Let's do it!
